tool_description: Validates and normalizes e-commerce product URLs, checking accessibility and extracting basic product identifiers.
error_messages: Invalid URL format: Provide a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL starting with protocol.
URL not accessible: The provided URL returned a non-200 status code or timed out.
Timeout value out of range: Use timeout_seconds between 5 and 60.
Not a supported e-commerce site: URL must be from a recognized e-commerce platform.
usage: Provide a product URL to validate its accessibility and format. Optionally set timeout_seconds for request timeout. Returns validation status and normalized URL.

is_valid.description: Whether the URL is valid and accessible

normalized_url.description: Cleaned and standardized version of the URL
